title: [Large-scale] Summer Learning Effect Enhancement Program Using Digital Blogs

context.prior_knowledge: Basic proficiency in using digital devices and experience with online communication
context.additional_context: Digital language learning program to mitigate summer learning loss among economically vulnerable students

learning_goals: Students write ≥5 themed blog posts (300+ characters each) weekly for one week, achieving ≥60/80 points on a teacher-evaluation rubric (grammar 20, organization 20, creativity 20, topic relevance 20) to demonstrate improved writing proficiency.
Based on peer blog feedback, students perform critical reading activities over three times weekly, demonstrating improved reading comprehension
By achieving over 80% participation rates at program closure, summer learning loss effects are mitigated

resources: Digital badges for student engagement incentives

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
